Oklahoma State athletic director Terry Don Phillips says it is time to replace the playing field at Lewis Field PERIOD He promises an artificial surface but the school isnt sure what type PERIOD



We have a strong interest in Nebraskas surface Phillips said PERIOD



OSU players and coaches liked the feel of FieldTurf when the team played there last fall PERIOD



FieldTurf is relatively new to the market and has the look and feel of natural grass PERIOD



Oklahoma State had planned to try to play one more season on the existing turf but Phillips said they will make the change this year if they can work it into the budgeting cycle PERIOD



He is confident the money can be found for the project PERIOD



The cost of a new surface would range from  to  and installation would take about three weeks PERIOD



The existing AstroTurf has been on the field since  five years longer than the general length of time for a surface to last PERIOD



Slick spots fading pulled seams and holes became obvious this past year PERIOD
